item.title: POST-APEC Global Vission Summit
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in POST-APEC Global Vision Summit

K-CareerNet was pleased to attend POST-APEC Global Vision Summit which is held from 27th-28th November 2025 in Gyeongju city.

The forum brought together Korean and international experts to discuss future industries ranging from K-culture until artificial intelligence.

K-Careernet aim to spread K-culture to the global community through our services.

item.title: 2025 SCCK Gala Dinner
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in the Swedish Chamber of Commece Gala Dinner

K-CareerNet was pleased to attend the 2025 Swedish Chamber of Commerce Gala Dinner on 14th November in Seoul.

The Gala Dinner strengthened the Swedish-Korean business relationships through networking, dining, and collaboration.

Through such international networking opportunities, K-CareerNet continues its mission to connect Korea with the global community and promote K-culture worldwide.

item.title: Hoseo University's job fair
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in Hoseo University’s job fair

K-CareerNet was pleased to meet the Hoseo Univeristy’s students.

We hope the best for all of the students and we will always support the students to prepare for their career in Korea.

item.title: Korean Intensive Camp
item.description:
Registration Open: Join Our Korean Intensive Camp!

K-CareerNet is now accepting applications for our Korean Intensive Camp - a comprehensive 5-days immersive experience designed to accelerate your Korean proficiency while providing fun cultural activities.

Program

Korean language workshop

  • Beginner-friendly: reading, writing, listening and speaking
  • Certificate of completion

Korean cultural activities

  • Korean food experiences
  • Korean traditional handcrafts experiences
  • Korean dance performances

Program details

  • Program period: 5-days (25-30 hours)
  • Application Deadline: ~ November 2025
  • Participant Limit: 50 participants maximum
  • Location: Jakarta (TBA)

Suitable for

  • University, high school, middle high school students
  • Professionals or anyone interested in Korean language anc culture

What’s Included

Full Support Package

  • Accommodation: 5-days
  • All Meals: Korean food
  • Transportation: Bus
  • Materials: Books, crafts

Application process

Don’t miss this opportunity for intensive Korean language learning combined with authentic cultural immersion.

Contact us for further information regarding schedule and price

item.title: TOPIK Special Lecture in Busan National University
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in Busan National University special lecture

K-CareerNet was pleased to be invited to give special lecture about TOPIK for international students in Busan National University, Busan, South Korea

We were very happy to see the enthusiam of the international students and admired their hard work to learn TOPIK and take TOPIK exam.

We hope the best for the students to pass the TOPIK exam succesfully!

item.title: Halla University Career Fair & Special Lecture
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in Halla University Career Fair

K-CareerNet was pleased to be invited to give the special lecture about Korean language and culture in Halla University in Wonju, Gangwon-do, South Korea.

We wish all international students the very best on their journey in Korea. K-CareerNet will always be here to support you!

item.title: ISRK cricket tournament
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in ISRK Cricket Tournament

K-CareerNet was pleased to attend the ISRK Cricket Tournament and met a lot of wonderful students that had a lot of interest in Korean culture

We hope the best for the students and we hope to participate in the further tournament!

item.title: The 200th Korean Government's International Students Networking Event
item.description:
K-CareerNet participated in 200 Event of the Korean Government’s International Students Networking

K-CareerNet was pleased to attend the 200th the Korean Government’s International Students Networking event

We provide not only Korean language but also Korean visa consultation and Korean job matching, we hope to see you all again next year!
